DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to gather information about causes and treatment of Antiphospholipid Syndrome.
DOC.brief_title: Register for Pediatric Patients With Antiphospholipid Syndrome (APS): European Project Extended Internationally Study
DOC.criteria: 18 years of age or younger at the onset of disease Presence of Vascular Thrombosis UC Davis patient Presence of at least one Laboratory criteria including: Anticardiolipin antibody, AntiB glycoproteinI antibody or Lupus anticoagulant in plasma Infants born to mothers with APS Infants with congenital thrombophilia
